casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Billy Thomas PEARSON 426P06-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Mr. Billy Thomas Pearson, Pro Se. Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, For State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of November 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
